original_text:
Age of Egypt
L’Antico Egitto torna per conquistare la tua attenzione, attraverso il gameplay di Age of Egypt, slot online che è stata realizzata da Playtech. Ha una struttura classica con 5 rulli e 20 linee di pagamento sulle quali è possibile scommettere con un minimo di 0,20 centesimi. Il player viene trasportato in una realtà storica, per mettersi alla ricerca di tesori nascosti sfruttando un paio di funzionalità ben create. Tra questi la funzione Bonus Anubi che offre di scegliere personalmente dei premi in denaro, senza dimenticare poi i giri gratuiti che sono abbinati a un moltiplicatore 3x. I bonus in stile ‘Pick me’ sono sempre una divertente soluzione per i giocatori esperti ma anche per i principianti che si sentono direttamente coinvolti sulle azioni di gioco. Scopriamo insieme tutto ciò che di buono ha da offrire questa macchinetta.
Grafica e simboli di gioco
Age of Egypt ha un buon aspetto grafico: ci troviamo sulle rive del Nilo durante un magico tramonto che ci mostra anche le piramidi in lontananza. Ogni mossa viene scandita da una colonna sonora in stile arabeggiante che accompagna l’intero gameplay del gioco base e cambia intensità nel momento in cui si attivano i giochi bonus. Tra i simboli spiccano Horus (il dio del cielo) e l’occhio di Horo, uniti alle immancabili carte reali A, K, Q, J e 10. Il simbolo speciale della Sfinge è scelto come Wild e ha il potere di prendere il posto di ogni altra icona per formare combinazioni vincenti. Ovviamente non può sostituire lo Scatter. Se si posizionano 2, 3, 4 o 5 Jolly sui rulli si ottengono 0,5, 10, 100 o 500 volte la tua scommessa. Ma la parte più affascinante è quella delle sue funzioni bonus. Abbiamo il Bonus Anubi che si attiva quando posizioni tre icone consecutivamente dal rullo uno fino al rullo due e tre. Qui potrai scegliere in autonomia il premio in denaro da aggiungere al tuo credito in base al numero di Simboli bonus che hai raccolto per attivare la stessa funzione.
Un’altra funzione interessante è quella legata allo Scatter, rappresentato dalla regina del faraone: 3 o più icone in qualsiasi posizione sui rulli ti faranno ricevere Free Spin. Ne avrai 10 con un moltiplicatore 3x e se compariranno altri simboli Scatter durante la funzione speciale avrai altri 10 giri extra.
Considerazioni finali sulla slot Age of Egypt
Sappiamo bene che l’Egitto è un tema molto amato dalle case di produzione che operano nel settore di gioco online, ma è altrettanto vero che ad amarlo sono i gamer. Per questo motivo ci sono numerose soluzioni di gioco che potrai trovare anche sul nostro sito. Age of Egypt però fa la differenza e risulta essere uno dei migliori mai creati e sviluppati per le piattaforme digitali. Non solo perché ha una bella grafica e un gameplay dinamico e intuitivo. Ma soprattutto perché sa rendere spettacolare l’esperienza del giocatore attraverso delle funzioni extra che sono piacevoli da provare. E che possono essere anche molto ricche in termini di vittorie ottenute.
Provare per credere: è tempo di iniziare anche questo viaggio verso l’Antico Egitto!

raw_translation.response:
Age of Egypt

The ancient Egypt returns to conquer your attention, through the gameplay of Age of Egypt, an online slot created by Playtech. With a classic structure of 5 reels and 20 paylines, you can bet with a minimum of 0.20 cents. The player is transported into a historical reality, to search for hidden treasures using a couple of well-created features. Among these, the Anubis Bonus function offers to personally choose cash prizes, not forgetting the free spins that are combined with a 3x multiplier. The 'pick me' style bonuses are always a fun solution for experienced players, but also for beginners who feel directly involved in the game actions. Let's discover together all the good things this machine has to offer.

Graphics and game symbols
Age of Egypt has a good graphical appearance: we are on the banks of the Nile during a magical sunset that also shows us the pyramids in the distance. Each move is marked by an Arabian-style soundtrack that accompanies the entire gameplay of the base game and changes intensity when the bonus games are activated. Among the symbols stand out Horus (the god of the sky) and the eye of Horo, combined with the inevitable royal cards A, K, Q, J, and 10. The special symbol of the Sphinx is chosen as the wild and has the power to take the place of any other icon to form winning combinations. Of course, it cannot replace the scatter. If you place 2, 3, 4, or 5 wilds on the reels, you will get 0.5, 10, 100, or 500 times your bet. But the most fascinating part is that of its bonus functions. We have the Anubis Bonus that activates when you position three icons from reel one to reel two and three consecutively. Here you can autonomously choose the cash prize to add to your credit based on the number of bonus symbols you have collected to activate the same function.

Another interesting function is that related to the scatter, represented by the queen of the pharaoh: 3 or more icons in any position on the reels will give you free spins. You will have 10 with a 3x multiplier, and if other scatter symbols appear during the special function, you will have another 10 extra spins.

Final considerations on the Age of Egypt slot
We know that Egypt is a theme much loved by production companies operating in the online gaming sector, but it is also true that gamers love it. For this reason, there are numerous gaming solutions that you can find on our site too. Age of Egypt, however, makes the difference and proves to be one of the best ever created and developed for digital platforms. Not just because it has a nice graphic and a dynamic and intuitive gameplay. But above all because it knows how to make the player's experience spectacular through extra functions that are pleasant to try. And that can also be very rich in terms of winnings obtained.

Try and believe it: it's time to start this journey to ancient Egypt too!

response.headline: Age of Egypt Overview
response.content: Age of Egypt is an online slot game created by Playtech, with a classic structure of 5 reels and 20 paylines. The game offers a minimum bet of 0.20 cents and has a theme based on ancient Egypt, with interesting features that allow players to search for hidden treasures.

response.headline: Game Graphics and Theme
response.content: Age of Egypt has a good graphical appearance, showcasing a magical sunset on the banks of the Nile with the pyramids in the distance. The game has an Arabian-style soundtrack and features symbols like Horus, the eye of Horus, royal cards A, K, Q, J, and 10, and the Sphinx as the wild symbol. The graphics and theme are well-designed and immersive.

response.headline: Symbol Design and Payouts
response.content: The symbols in Age of Egypt include Horus, the eye of Horus, royal cards A, K, Q, J, and 10, and the Sphinx as the wild symbol. Players can win 0.5, 10, 100, or 500 times their bet by placing 2, 3, 4, or 5 wilds on the reels. The Anubis Bonus and free spins offer additional chances to win prizes based on the number of bonus symbols collected.

response.headline: Special Features (Wild and Scatter Symbols, Bonus Rounds, etc.)
response.content: Age of Egypt offers multiple special features, including the Sphinx as the wild symbol that can replace any other icon to form winning combinations. The Anubis Bonus can be activated by positioning three icons from reel one to reel two and three consecutively, and offers cash prizes that can be autonomously chosen by players. The queen of the pharaoh is the scatter symbol, and players can trigger free spins by landing 3 or more scatter symbols on any position on the reels. During the free spins, players can get up to 10 extra spins with a 3x multiplier. These bonus features are exciting and engaging for players and can lead to significant winnings.

response.headline: Overall Gameplay Experience
response.content: Age of Egypt is an engaging and immersive online slot game with a history-based theme of ancient Egypt. The well-designed graphics and soundtrack make the gameplay experience even better. The game features multiple special features, such as the Anubis Bonus, free spins, and the Sphinx as the wild symbol, providing players with many chances to win prizes. Overall, Age of Egypt is one of the best online slot games themed around ancient Egypt and can be enjoyed by both beginners and experienced players alike.

Review: Age of Egypt

The ancient Egypt returns to conquer your attention, through the gameplay of Age of Egypt, an online slot created by Playtech. With a classic structure of 5 reels and 20 paylines, you can bet with a minimum of 0.20 cents. The player is transported into a historical reality, to search for hidden treasures using a couple of well-created features. Among these, the Anubis Bonus function offers to personally choose cash prizes, not forgetting the free spins that are combined with a 3x multiplier. The 'pick me' style bonuses are always a fun solution for experienced players, but also for beginners who feel directly involved in the game actions. Let's discover together all the good things this machine has to offer.

Graphics and game symbols
Age of Egypt has a good graphical appearance: we are on the banks of the Nile during a magical sunset that also shows us the pyramids in the distance. Each move is marked by an Arabian-style soundtrack that accompanies the entire gameplay of the base game and changes intensity when the bonus games are activated. Among the symbols stand out Horus (the god of the sky) and the eye of Horo, combined with the inevitable royal cards A, K, Q, J, and 10. The special symbol of the Sphinx is chosen as the wild and has the power to take the place of any other icon to form winning combinations. Of course, it cannot replace the scatter. If you place 2, 3, 4, or 5 wilds on the reels, you will get 0.5, 10, 100, or 500 times your bet. But the most fascinating part is that of its bonus functions. We have the Anubis Bonus that activates when you position three icons from reel one to reel two and three consecutively. Here you can autonomously choose the cash prize to add to your credit based on the number of bonus symbols you have collected to activate the same function.

Another interesting function is that related to the scatter, represented by the queen of the pharaoh: 3 or more icons in any position on the reels will give you free spins. You will have 10 with a 3x multiplier, and if other scatter symbols appear during the special function, you will have another 10 extra spins.

Final considerations on the Age of Egypt slot
We know that Egypt is a theme much loved by production companies operating in the online gaming sector, but it is also true that gamers love it. For this reason, there are numerous gaming solutions that you can find on our site too. Age of Egypt, however, makes the difference and proves to be one of the best ever created and developed for digital platforms. Not just because it has a nice graphic and a dynamic and intuitive gameplay. But above all because it knows how to make the player's experience spectacular through extra functions that are pleasant to try. And that can also be very rich in terms of winnings obtained.

Try and believe it: it's time to start this journey to ancient Egypt too!

Symbol Design and Payouts

Special Features (Wild and Scatter Symbols, Bonus Rounds, etc.)

Review:
 
Age of Egypt

Age of Egypt is an online slot game created by Playtech that brings the theme of ancient Egypt to life. The game has a classic structure of 5 reels and 20 paylines with a minimum bet of 0.20 cents.

Playtech

Playtech is the developer of Age of Egypt, a provider of software solutions for online gaming operators since 1999. The company is one of the largest providers of online gaming software in the world.

Online slot game

Age of Egypt is an online slot game, which means it can be played from anywhere at any time with an internet connection. The game is accessible on desktop computers, laptops, smartphones, and tablets.

Ancient Egypt

The theme of Age of Egypt is ancient Egypt. The game transports players into a historical reality to search for hidden treasures using well-created bonus features. The game includes symbols such as Horus, the eye of Horo, and the Sphinx.

Graphics

Age of Egypt has good graphics. Players are taken to the banks of the Nile during a magical sunset, accompanied by an Arabian-style soundtrack that changes with bonus feature activation. The game includes well-designed symbols, such as Horus, the eye of Horo, the Sphinx, and the queen of the pharaoh who represents the scatter.

faq.question: What is Age of Egypt?
faq.answer: Age of Egypt is an online slot game created by Playtech that has a classic structure of 5 reels and 20 paylines. It is based on the theme of ancient Egypt and offers players the chance to search for hidden treasures.

faq.question: What are the minimum bet requirements for Age of Egypt?
faq.answer: The minimum bet requirement for Age of Egypt is 0.20 cents.

faq.question: What features does Age of Egypt offer?
faq.answer: Age of Egypt offers a couple of well-created features, including the Anubis Bonus function where players can personally choose cash prizes, and free spins that are combined with a 3x multiplier.

faq.question: What are the game symbols in Age of Egypt?
faq.answer: The game symbols in Age of Egypt include Horus (the god of the sky), the Eye of Horus, royal cards A, K, Q, J, and 10, and a special symbol of the Sphinx that is chosen as the wild and has the power to take the place of any other icon to form winning combinations.

faq.question: What is the Anubis Bonus in Age of Egypt?
faq.answer: The Anubis Bonus is a feature in Age of Egypt that activates when you position three bonus symbols consecutively on reels one to three. Here you can choose the cash prize to add to your credit based on the number of bonus symbols you have collected to activate the same function.

faq.question: What is the scatter symbol in Age of Egypt?
faq.answer: The scatter symbol in Age of Egypt is represented by the queen of the pharaoh and can appear in any position on the reels. If you get 3 or more scatter symbols, you will get free spins.

faq.question: How many free spins can you get in Age of Egypt?
faq.answer: You can get 10 free spins with a 3x multiplier in Age of Egypt. If other scatter symbols appear during the free spins feature, you will get another 10 extra spins.

faq.question: Is Age of Egypt a good slot game?
faq.answer: In our review, we found Age of Egypt to be one of the best online slot games ever created and developed for digital platforms. It has good graphics, an intuitive gameplay, and extra functions that are pleasant to try and can be very rewarding in terms of winnings.

faq.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Age of Egypt".

Please provide an FAQ:

- 8 questions
- Use simple language and provide practical takeaways.

Review: Age of Egypt

The ancient Egypt returns to conquer your attention, through the gameplay of Age of Egypt, an online slot created by Playtech. With a classic structure of 5 reels and 20 paylines, you can bet with a minimum of 0.20 cents. The player is transported into a historical reality, to search for hidden treasures using a couple of well-created features. Among these, the Anubis Bonus function offers to personally choose cash prizes, not forgetting the free spins that are combined with a 3x multiplier. The 'pick me' style bonuses are always a fun solution for experienced players, but also for beginners who feel directly involved in the game actions. Let's discover together all the good things this machine has to offer.

Graphics and game symbols
Age of Egypt has a good graphical appearance: we are on the banks of the Nile during a magical sunset that also shows us the pyramids in the distance. Each move is marked by an Arabian-style soundtrack that accompanies the entire gameplay of the base game and changes intensity when the bonus games are activated. Among the symbols stand out Horus (the god of the sky) and the eye of Horo, combined with the inevitable royal cards A, K, Q, J, and 10. The special symbol of the Sphinx is chosen as the wild and has the power to take the place of any other icon to form winning combinations. Of course, it cannot replace the scatter. If you place 2, 3, 4, or 5 wilds on the reels, you will get 0.5, 10, 100, or 500 times your bet. But the most fascinating part is that of its bonus functions. We have the Anubis Bonus that activates when you position three icons from reel one to reel two and three consecutively. Here you can autonomously choose the cash prize to add to your credit based on the number of bonus symbols you have collected to activate the same function.

Another interesting function is that related to the scatter, represented by the queen of the pharaoh: 3 or more icons in any position on the reels will give you free spins. You will have 10 with a 3x multiplier, and if other scatter symbols appear during the special function, you will have another 10 extra spins.

Final considerations on the Age of Egypt slot
We know that Egypt is a theme much loved by production companies operating in the online gaming sector, but it is also true that gamers love it. For this reason, there are numerous gaming solutions that you can find on our site too. Age of Egypt, however, makes the difference and proves to be one of the best ever created and developed for digital platforms. Not just because it has a nice graphic and a dynamic and intuitive gameplay. But above all because it knows how to make the player's experience spectacular through extra functions that are pleasant to try. And that can also be very rich in terms of winnings obtained.

Try and believe it: it's time to start this journey to ancient Egypt too!
